command.name: give
command.description: Give user a certain amount of an item. Items: 1 - Axe 2 - Shotgun 3 - Double-Barrelled Shotgun 4 - Nailgun 5 - Super Nailgun 6 - Grenade Launcher 7 - Rocket Launcher 8 - ThunderBolt C - Cells H - Health N - Nails R - Rockets S - Shells Note: The -cheats parameter must be used to launch the server to use the give command. Also the key and value *cheats ON will be displayed in the serverinfo information. Examples: give 1234 R 99 will give for user 1234 99 rockets. give 1234 7 will give for user 1234 rocket launcher.
